data.name: saleReport.ReportResourceString
data.value:
﻿<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <Report ScriptLanguage="Vb" ReportInfo.Created="05/19/2018 16:18:52" ReportInfo.Modified="05/19/2018 17:44:52" ReportInfo.CreatorVersion="2018.3.1.0"> <Dictionary> <OdbcDataConnection Name="Connection" ConnectionString="rijcmlqDsfwzqmpop0DqfGfr49Br1BEBRTg6bCmgJFsVfVGp0qFPEObhd3hT7IFAJw4XsqVYmk56fnGKrcLO+UpGfNk7yovZ1WDCE4n41hnLNhwI3wGW2d2jgt4yQS+2pyDKr3g"> <TableDataSource Name="Table" Alias="Software" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 chosensoftware.BasketID,
 chosensoftware.SoftwareQuantity,
 software.SoftwareName,
 software.SoftwareCost
FROM chosensoftware
 INNER JOIN software
 ON chosensoftware.SoftwareID = software.SoftwareID"> <Column Name="SoftwareQuantity" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="SoftwareName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="SoftwareCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table1" Alias="AdditionalServices" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 chosenadditionalservices.BasketID,
 additionalservices.AdditionalServiceName,
 additionalservices.AdditionalServiceCost
FROM chosenadditionalservices
 INNER JOIN additionalservices
 ON chosenadditionalservices.AdditionalServiceID = additionalservices.AdditionalServiceID"> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="AdditionalServiceName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="AdditionalServiceCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table2" Alias="Components" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 componentslist.BasketID,
 componentslist.GoodsQuantity,
 goodscatalog.GoodsName,
 goodscatalog.GoodsCost
FROM componentslist
 INNER JOIN goodscatalog
 ON componentslist.GoodsID = goodscatalog.GoodsID"> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="GoodsQuantity" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="GoodsName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="GoodsCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> <TableDataSource Name="Table3" Alias="ServiceMaintenance" DataType="System.Int32" Enabled="true" SelectCommand="SELECT
 chosenservicemaintenance.BasketID,
 servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceName,
 servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceCost
FROM chosenservicemaintenance
 INNER JOIN servicemaintenance
 ON chosenservicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceID = servicemaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceID"> <Column Name="BasketID" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Column Name="ServiceMaintenanceName" DataType="System.String"/> <Column Name="ServiceMaintenanceCost" DataType="System.Decimal"/> </TableDataSource> </OdbcDataConnection> <Parameter Name="basketID" DataType="System.Int32" Expression="5"/> <Parameter Name="TotalCost" DataType="FastReport.Variant" Expression="[TotalSoftware] + [TotalAdditionalServices] + [TotalComponents] + [TotalServiceMaintenance]"/> <Parameter Name="SoftwareTotalCost" DataType="System.Decimal" Expression="[Software.SoftwareQuantity] * [Software.SoftwareCost]"/> <Parameter Name="ComponentsTotalCost" DataType="System.Decimal" Expression="[Components.GoodsQuantity] * [Components.GoodsCost]"/> <Parameter Name="Number" DataType="System.Int32"/> <Total Name="TotalSoftware" Expression="[Software.SoftwareQuantity] * [Software.SoftwareCost]" Evaluator="Data1"/> <Total Name="TotalAdditionalServices" Expression="[AdditionalServices.AdditionalServiceCost]" Evaluator="Data2"/> <Total Name="TotalComponents" Expression="[Components.GoodsQuantity] * [Components.GoodsCost]" Evaluator="Data3"/> <Total Name="TotalServiceMaintenance" Expression="[ServiceMaintenance.ServiceMaintenanceCost]" Evaluator="Data4"/> </Dictionary> <ReportPage Name="Page1"> <ReportTitleBand Name="ReportTitle1" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text5" Left="236.25" Top="9.45" Width="245.7" Height="28.35" Text="Товарный чек" HorzAlign="Center" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 16pt, style=Bold"/> </ReportTitleBand> <PageHeaderBand Name="PageHeader1" Top="49.54" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text17" Top="9.45" Width="718.2" Height="28.35" Fill.Color="DarkGray"/> <TextObject Name="Text7" Left="37.8" Top="9.45" Width="444.15" Height="28.35" Text="Наименование" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text6" Top="9.45" Width="37.8" Height="28.35" Text="№" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text9" Left="481.95" Top="9.45" Width="75.6" Height="28.35" Text="Цена" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text8" Left="557.55" Top="9.45" Width="85.05" Height="28.35" Text="Кол-во" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text14" Left="642.6" Top="9.45" Width="75.6" Height="28.35" Text="Сумма" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> </PageHeaderBand> <DataBand Name="Data1" Top="99.07" Width="718.2" Height="37.8" DataSource="Table" Filter="[Software.BasketID] = [basketID]"> <TextObject Name="Text1" Left="37.8" Top="9.45" Width="444.15" Height="18.9" Text="[Software.SoftwareName]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text2" Left="557.55" Top="9.45" Width="85.05" Height="18.9" Text="[Software.SoftwareQuantity]" Text="[Components.GoodsCost]" Format="Currency" Format.UseLocale="true" HorzAlign="Right" VertAlign="Center" WordWrap="false" Trimming="EllipsisCharacter"/> <TextObject Name="Text21" Left="557.55" Top="9.45" Width="85.05" Height="18.9" Text="[Components.GoodsQuantity]" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text22" Left="642.6" Top="9.45" Width="75.6" Height="18.9" Text="[ComponentsTotalCost]" Format="Currency" Format.UseLocale="true" HorzAlign="Right" VertAlign="Center"/> <TextObject Name="Text4" Top="9.45" Width="37.8" Height="18.9" Text="[Row#]"/> </DataBand> <DataBand Name="Data4" Top="219.33" Width="718.2" Height="37.8" DataSource="Table3" Filter="[ServiceMaintenance.BasketID] = [basketID]"> <TextObject Name="Text24" Left="37.8" Top="9.45" Width="444.15" Height="18.9" <TextObject Name="Text26" Left="557.55" Top="9.45" Width="85.05" Height="18.9" Text="1" VertAlign="Center"/> </DataBand> <ReportSummaryBand Name="ReportSummary1" Top="259.41" Width="718.2" Height="47.25"> <TextObject Name="Text28" Top="9.45" Width="567" Height="28.35" Text="Итого:" HorzAlign="Right" VertAlign="Center" Font="Arial, 14pt, style=Bold"/> <TextObject Name="Text29" Left="567"
